Recommendations: the research results and output of students were used in the improvement of instructional processes it is suggested that proper documentation for utilization must be established
functional linkages with other agencies government and nongovernment organizations for technical assistance service inputs and additional funding are suggested

the institution may consider to implement regularly varied and responsive research capability building modalities such as mentoring and peer teaching especially for paper writing publication and patent drafting to strengthen the research capability of the faculty

the program may consider applying varied strategies on how generated technologies can be transferred and adopted by the community through the help of the extension department lgu and barangay officials
exchange of research publications with other hels and other agencies may be improved and properly documented
